entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:09 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:09 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:09 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
